ANNIE WONG

Computer Science B.S. - University of California, San Diego

ABOUT ME

Hello! I am an undergraduate student at UC San Diego pursuing a degree in computer science with a minor in economics. I love the process of planning, designing, and building software and algorithms and I am excited to gain new skills and experiences that will aid me on my quest to build better algorithms and programs!

EXPERIENCE

UC San Diego Computer Science Department

Reseach Assiatant
Sep 2019 - Jun 2020

Details
  • In a team of four, performed research on improving text line segmentation for optical character recognition on machine-printed historical documents.
  • Built text line segmentation algorithms for historical documents using histogram projection and connected component analysis.
  • Implemented a convolutional neural network for page layout analysis and text line segmentation.
  • Other contributions include: literature searching, proposal writing, and project management.

PROJECTS

WIC Winter Dev Projects - TimeQuilt

Mobile Application
January 2021 - May 2021

Details
  • 3rd place winner out of 8 teams.
  • In a team of 5, developed a mobile application for journaling and tracking events that occur throughout the week.
  • Contributions include: front end interface implementation, app navigation implementation, back end debugging, and document preparation.
  • Tools and technologies used: Node.js, React Native, Expo, Firebase, Figma, Lucidchart, JavaScript, HTML/CSS.

ACM Side Projects - Cocial

Mobile Application

Details

  • Tools and technologies used: Node.js, React Native, Expo, MongoDB, Figma, Lucidchart, TypeScript, HTML/CSS.

RShell
